 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁדַד‎</span>]<sub>56</sub> **verb** ==deal violently with, despoil, devastate, ruin== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Niph\`al; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***stop up, obstruct, arrest, make firm***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***expel***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šadâdu***</u></abbr> is ***draw, drag***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָֽׁדְדוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.32.12|Ezek 32:12]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁדּוּנִי‎</span> [[Ps.17.9|Ps 17:9]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשׁוּד‎</span> (metaplastic, compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67q»§ 67q</sup> [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]) [[Ps.91.6|Ps 91:6]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשָׁדֵּם‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67n»§ 67n</sup>) [[Prov.11.3|Prov 11:3]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] Perfect <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ושׁדם‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשָׁדְדֵם‎</span> [[Jer.5.6|Jer 5:6]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁדְדו‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67cc»§ 67cc</sup>) [[Jer.49.28|Jer 49:28]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁדוֺד‎</span> [[Mic.2.4|Mic 2:4]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁדוֺד‎</span> [[Jer.47.4|Jer 47:4]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:45g»§ 45g</sup>), compare also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁד‎</span> [[Hos.10.14|Hos 10:14]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁדֵד‎</span> [[Jer.6.26|Jer 6:26]] +,etc.; ***pass***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁדוּד‎</span> [[Judg.5.27|Judg 5:27]] +, feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁדוּדָה‎</span> [[Ps.137.8|Ps 137:8]] — ***violently destory***, person, = ***slay*** [[Judg.5.27|Judg 5:27]] (passive), [[Jer.5.6|Jer 5:6]] (wolf subject; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכָּה‎</span>); accusative Philistines [[Jer.47.4|Jer 47:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכְרִית‎</span>), v[[Jer.47.4|Jer 47:4]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); = ***devastate***, accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּבֶל‎</span> (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Jer.51.55|Jer 51:55]], compare [[Ps.137.8|Ps 137:8]] (read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשֹּׁדֵדָה‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Du|Du]], compare [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁדוֺדָה‎</span> see [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii.194</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתגְּֿאוֺן מִצְרַיִם‎</span> [[Ezek.32.12|Ezek 32:12]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁמַד‎</span>), compare [[Hos.10.14|Hos 10:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתמַֿרְעִיתָם‎</span> [[Jer.25.36|Jer 25:36]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), absolute [[Isa.21.2|Isa 21:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּגַד‎</span>), [[Isa.33.1|Isa 33:1]] (on use of pt see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:120b»§ 120b</sup>), pass v[[Isa.33.1|Isa 33:1]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּגַד‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַתְּי שָׁדוּד‎</span> [[Jer.4.30|Jer 4:30]] ([[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 179</sup>, but dubious; &lt; [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁדוּדָה‎</span>); = ***despoil***, accusative of person [[Jer.49.28|Jer 49:28]] = ***bring*** person ***to ruin*** [[Mic.2.4|Mic 2:4]] (Infinitive absolute + Niph\`al q. v.), [[Prov.11.3|Prov 11:3]] weaker, ***assail*** [[Ps.17.9|Ps 17:9]] elsewhere ***Participle active*** as substantive ***devastator (despoiler?)***: of national foes [[Isa.16.4|Isa 16:4]]; [[Isa.21.2|Isa 21:2]]; [[Isa.33.1|Isa 33:1]]; [[Jer.6.26|Jer 6:26]] + 8 t. Jeremiah; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺדְדֵי לַיְלָה‎</span> [[Obad.1.5|Obad 1:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּנָּבִים‎</span>) strike out [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]; personal foe [[Job.15.21|Job 15:21]] representing wicked in general [[Job.12.6|Job 12:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְגִּיזֵי אֵל‎</span>). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁדוֺד נְשַׁדֻּנוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67u»§ 67u</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 342 f.</sup>) ***we are utterly ruined.*** **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתְּֿשַׁדֵּד רִבְצוֺ‎</span> [[Prov.24.15|Prov 24:15]] ***assault not his dwelling-place*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלאֱֶֿרֹב‎</span>); ***Participle*** as substantive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁדֶּדאָֿב‎</span> [[Prov.19.26|Prov 19:26]] ***he who assaults, maltreats*** (his) father (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַבְרִיחַ אֵם‎</span>). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁדַּד‎</span> [[Isa.15.1|Isa 15:1]] +, 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁדְּדָה‎</span> [[Jer.4.20|Jer 4:20]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁדְּדָה‎</span> [[Nah.3.7|Nah 3:7]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:52q»§ 52q</sup>), etc.; — ***be devastated***, of city [[Isa.15.1|Isa 15:1]] (twice in verse); [[Isa.23.1|Isa 23:1]]; [[Jer.48.1|Jer 48:1]]; [[Jer.49.3|Jer 49:3]]; [[Nah.3.7|Nah 3:7]], country or nation [[Jer.4.20|Jer 4:20]], compare v[[Jer.4.13|Jer 4:13]]; [[Jer.9.18|Jer 9:18]]; [[Jer.48.15|Jer 48:15]]; [[Jer.48.20|Jer 48:20]]; [[Jer.49.10|Jer 49:10]], dwellings (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹהֶל‎</span>) [[Jer.4.20|Jer 4:20]]; [[Jer.10.20|Jer 10:20]], trees [[Zech.11.2|Zech 11:2]] (strike out [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>ZAW 1 (1881), 25</sup>), compare v[[Zech.11.33|Zech 11:33]], stength of ships [[Isa.23.14|Isa 23:14]], field (by drought) [[Joel.1.10|Joel 1:10]], crop v[[Joel.1.10|Joel 1:10]]. Po\`l. ***violently destroy: Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשֹׁרֵד מַצֵּבוֺתָם‎</span> [[Hos.10.2|Hos 10:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲרֹף מִוְבְּחֹתָם‎</span>). **Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** (or **Qal** ***passive Imperfect?*** compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53u»§ 53u</sup>) ***be devastated:*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלמִֿבְצָרֶיךָ יוּשָּׁ֑ד‎</span> [[Hos.10.14|Hos 10:14]] (of Ephraim, &lt; [[BDB#We|We]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יושׁדו‎</span>); 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוּשַּׁד‎</span> [[Isa.33.1|Isa 33:1]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺדֵד‎</span>, see **Qal**).
